code: import{toast}from'react-toastify';export var toastError=function toastError(error){var message=null;if(typeof error==='object'&&error.message){message=error.message;}if(message!==null&&typeof message!=='undefined'&&message!==''){toast.error(message);}};export var toastSuccess=function toastSuccess(message){if(message!==null&&typeof message!=='undefined'&&message!==''){toast.success(message);}};
